source:
graph TD
  USER[User] -->|Upload| DROP[Dropzone]
  DROP -->|Images| STORE[(LocalStorage)]
  DROP --> SELECT{Adapter Selection}
  SELECT -->|Mock| MOCK[MockAdapter]
  SELECT -->|Ollama| OLLAMA[OllamaAdapter]
  SELECT -->|OpenAI| OPENAI[OpenAIAdapter]
  SELECT -->|Claude| CLAUDE[ClaudeAdapter]
  SELECT -->|Google| GOOGLE[GoogleAdapter]
  MOCK --> ANALYZE[Analyze Image]
  OLLAMA --> ANALYZE
  OPENAI --> ANALYZE
  CLAUDE --> ANALYZE
  GOOGLE --> ANALYZE
  ANALYZE -->|Vision API| RESULT[Metadata Result]
  RESULT -->|title, tags, description| STORE
  RESULT --> GRID[ThumbnailGrid]
  GRID -->|Select| DETAIL[Image Detail View]
  GRID -->|Batch| BATCH[Create Batch]
  BATCH --> EXPORT[/Export/]

meta.title: MetaLens Image Analysis Flow
meta.description: Upload images → AI vision analysis → metadata extraction → batch export
